product_name: SportHill Ridge Tank Top - Men's - 2012 Special Buy
long_description: The SportHill Ridge tank top is built for trail runners. Polyester knit fabric moves moisture away from the skin and dries quickly. Shoulder seams are shifted to the front to reduce friction. Flatlock seams offer flexibility and comfort. Droptail hem and reflective logos round out features. Special buy.
short_description: The SportHill Ridge tank top is built for trail runners.
